ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Great help and encouragement/newbies
ygData.msgSnippet: No problem I know how confusing and overwhelming EQ can be to a totall newbie.  One last tip you might want to know about the bazaar..cycle thru the F9 key to
ygData.messageBody:
No problem I know how confusing and overwhelming EQ can be to a totall
newbie. One last tip you might want to know about the bazaar..cycle thru
the F9 key to change camera angles, keep cycling thru until you get the
top-down view, using this view greatly reduces the lag big time. That tower
you went to must of been Kurn's Tower, it's full of undead and badgers, very
dangerous place for a low level character. I hope to get DSL turned on soon
so I can get back to EQ...

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: armsfullofblessings [mailto:armsfullofblessings@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 08, 2004 6:51 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Great help and encouragement/newbies


Wow...thanks so much for the really helpful and encouraging
replies. I feel so much more courageous ;o) than before...have
printed off all your tips and will study, yahhhhhhhhhh I have a
little more guidance now...

I made it to Luclin to the Bazaar, but may be stuck there now...feel
like a bobble head Paly doll from all the lag. Oh, went to Kunark
and somehow have lived to tell about it...wandered to what is called
the wizzy towers or some sort of settlement...hugged the treeline
all the way back to the PoP spires...reallllly don't want to go back
there til' I am about a level 60 ;o)! I hope I can get the items I
want and get back to Greater Faydark sometime before spring...


Blue skies,
Q on Brell
